Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored 32 points and 10 rebounds, with 29 points in the second half
Nick Richards contributed 15 points and 12 rebounds off the bench
Devin Booker had 39 points and 10 assists
Charlotte dominated Phoenix on the glass, outrebounding the Suns 59-42
Ball drew in two defenders and dished to an open Brandon Miller, who knocked down a wide-open 3-pointer from the corner to put the Hornets up by 11 with 1:21 left in the game
Post-Match Reflections: This was only the third game this season — and first time for back-to-back games — the Hornets have had all five starters on the floor together
